course_title: Advanced Applied Methods in Social Epidemiology
class_notes: Pre-requisites of EPI 591S, EPI 550 or other modeling course or instructor permission. EPI/GLEPI students and EPI PHD priority registration until Nov 1.
course_description: Introduction to theory and application of methods relevant to social epidemiology including approaches to causal inference, spatial, and multilevel.
schedule_location: MF 1pm-2:20pm in Grace Crum Rollins RAR
sections: Class Nbr: 3369, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MF 1-2:20p, Instructor: Kramer/Wien, Status: Open
